department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide rental of heavy equipment without operator, on behalf of Federal Government Departments located in the Ontario Region.
description: Rental of heavy equipment without operator, on behalf of Federal Government Departments located in the Ontario Region.
full_summary:
# Title: E6TOR-23RM03 Heavy Construction Equipment Rental
## Description
The Government of Canada invites solicitations for supply arrangement (SA) contracts to provide rental of heavy equipment without operator. This supply arrangement will be used by Federal Government Departments located in the Ontario Region.
### Service Description
This SA is for the rental of heavy construction equipment that includes, but is not limited to:

* Backhoes
* Bulldozers
* Excavators
* Vacuum and flusher trucks
* Loaders
* Trenchers
* Gradealls
* Dump trucks
* Cranes
* 4WD outdoor forklifts
* Floats

### Tender Details

* **Tender Number:** WS4061831571
* **Publication Date:** 2023-06-19
* **Closing Date:** 2023-07-07T14:00:00 (NOTE: This tender is cancelled)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-07-31
* **Contract End Date:** 2028-06-30
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except NCR)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Not applicable

### Cancellation Notice
Please note that the tender for this contract is **cancelled** as per the information provided. As a result, no further proposals or bids will be accepted.

### Pre-Qualification
Canada is seeking to pre-qualify bidders for future requests for quotations. Therefore, there is no pricing requested in this document.

### Contact Information
###### Barltrop, David (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: <david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
Phone: Not provided

### Additional Resources
For more information about this tender, please visit the following link: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16627193?extsite=MTY2MjcxOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
